summary: L.G.S.: Shinsetsu Houshin Engi is a sequel to S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki by Otomate.

name: LG Chess
summary: A Chess game released in the Digital ez LG bundle, being one of the two original games in it.

name: Lgnorant girl doll
summary: Lgnorant girl doll is a game of two girls traveling in a wide world. They confront a lot of trials for their own mission. One person is a calm doll girl Another person is an emotional girl They will combine power and fight against terrible enemies Through the fields and dungeons, they become stronger.

name: LGeneral
summary: An open source tactical wargame based on SSI's Panzer General

name: LGBT Flags Merge!
summary: Merge LGBT flags together to make new ones. Will you find them all?

name: LGBT Battlegrounds
summary: Once they said that the royal battle was not for sexual minorities. Now this is not so, LGBT Battlegrounds should unite gays, lesbians, transsexuals and bisexuals of all sorts
